natural solution: The largest common factor of $9x^2$ and $3x$ is $3x$.
We factor $3x$ out of each term to get\begin{align} 9x^2+3x &= 3x\cdot 3x + 3x \cdot 1\\ &= \boxed{3x(3x+1)}. \end{align}
